Name: JIRA - Transition Issues
Description: Transitions JIRA issues as the code they are associated with gets deployed.

Parameters.Name: Jira.Transition.Url
Parameters.Label: JIRA URL
Parameters.HelpText: The base URL of the JIRA Server (e.g. http://tempuri.org/jira)

Parameters.Name: Jira.Transition.Username
Parameters.Label: Username
Parameters.HelpText: The username of the account that will be used to run the transition. The account should have sufficient permissions in JIRA to run the transition.

Parameters.Name: Jira.Transition.Password
Parameters.Label: Password
Parameters.HelpText: The password of the account that will be used to run the transaction.

Parameters.Name: Jira.Transition.Name
Parameters.Label: Transition
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the transition that should be applied to the JIRA tickets. If an issue does not have the named transition, it will be ignored.

Parameters.Name: Jira.Transition.Query
Parameters.Label: JQL
Parameters.HelpText: The JIRA query that should be used to select issues that will be transitioned (e.g. status = Completed AND fixVersion = 1.2.3)
